urls.title: Phunware, a data firm for Trump campaign, got millions in coronavirus small business help
urls.description: Public company whose board chair is a former top JPMorgan Chase executive received nearly $3 million from the bank.

text: A digital technology company that is working for President Donald Trump's re-election campaign received $2.85 million in aid through the paycheck protection program--nearly 14 times the current PPP average of $206,000. https://t.co/fvshgVG5p8
